climbs.name: Marv the Mangler
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Tucker Tech, Rhesa Ashbacher, Mike Lopez, Will Strickland, Krystal Henderson,

content.description: This climb is located near the hospital in Joshua Tree, east of town.  It is located on an obvious buttress of rock not far from where you park your car.  (Bonita Street).  It is east the the crags which are behind the hospital.  4 bolts to a 2 bolt anchor .  The crack to the right has been led too at 5.10-.
content.location: Hospital Crags Area off the main hwy, not far from where you park your car on Bonita Street.

climbs.name: Hot-N-Ready
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Greg Epperson, Kevin Daniels, Rhesa Ashbacher, Michelle

content.description: This climb goes up a diagonal crack which goes across the crag left to right. This crag is easily spotted from the main road, and is sort of isolated, as there isn't much else in the area to climb.
content.location: This crag is located on the hillside south of the main highway, in between the town of Joshua Tree, and the Joshua Tree hospital.  I'm not sure if the land is BLM, Section 6, or National Park. The climb faces the highway.

climbs.name: Guam
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon,  Jade, Steven Powers, Locker, Krystal Henderson, Pooner

content.description: This small spire is located in the hillside So. of the main highway before you get to the hospital in Joshua Tree.  It is in between the town of Joshua Tree and the Joshua Tree hospital.
content.protection: Mostly bolted. There might be a piece or two needed;...I can't remember.
content.location: So. of highway, between the town of Joshua Tree and the Joshua Tree hospital.

content.protection:
4 bolts, gear to 1”.

Bolted anchor, walk off climber’s left.
content.location:
Top of the hill behind the water tank.

Faces West.
